   - **Reference**: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS). [CDC Website](https://www.cdc.gov/brfss/index.html)

   - **Reference**: National Health Interview Survey. [CDC Website](https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/hus.htm)
